name: Frozen 2 Mod
description: Thank you for downloading Frozen 2 Mod! This mod provides you the best Frozen experience. Contents including such as: Enchanted Forest, Spirit Blocks, etc. Also comes with Anna and Elsa! I hope you enjoy the mod! If you find any bug, be sure to report them in the issue tracker. Credits: Disney - Making Frozen 2, W2D5W8 - Anna skin from PlanetMinecraft, FanofWak - Elsa skin from PlanetMinecraft, Schnabbellchen - Fifth Spirit Elsa skin from PlanetMinecraft
